nsubj follow anyone	13.674145418655403
xcomp follow solve	13.674145418655403
dobj follow which	13.451001867341194
dobj describe set	13.26868031054724
acl:relcl rules follow	13.11452963071998
xcomp use describe	12.575533129987294
dobj use word	12.015917342051871
aux follow can	11.50509171828588
nmod:of set rules	11.422853620048908
dobj solve problem	10.13318609461809
case rules of	9.450967984590333
mark solve to	9.443668682108722
mark describe to	9.191142866641519
det word the	8.736080817393983
det set a	8.640444851628152
punct use .	7.96952995769531
